title: screw CoC and maintenance wtf going crazy
body:
dis punk azz b1tch be attackin me like he da next Dzhokhar Tsarnaev and gets punked lik a lil B by my defenses, and i was jus waitin fo dis foo to get pwned again by my offenses, waitin for my last baloon to come out and BOOM server maintenance. please try again in 30 minutes.

WTF dis fool be payin gameloft in blowjobs to save him from da embarrassment or what? he kno i woulda shared the fk out of dat replay.
